archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.4.7c: c) identifies threat events likely to be used to attack the organisation (i.e. the methods and techniques used by attackers to perform reconnaissance, gain access, maintain control, compromise information and exploit information)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
